name: I Must Run!
description:
I Must Run! is a skill-based action running game. Jump over gaps in prison buildings, run through a metro station and test your reflexes in a deadly run over construction yard cranes. Reach the city center and save your wife. Remember, you have only 24 hours. You must run!


All trademarks, logos and copyrights are property of their respective owners.
